item.title: Rails Conf 2021 Talks for Early Career Devs
item.description: Now that almost all Rails Conf 2021 talks are available on YouTube, you might be wondering which ones you should watch first. (by the way, the links to the talks will be added here as they are uploaded to RubyCentral’s Youtube channel.) If you are just getting started with your Rails journey, here’s a list of 5 talks for you (with resources): 1. Implicit to Explicit: Decoding Ruby’s Magical Syntax by Justin Gordon [Talk] Do you wish you could understand better what Rails does under the hood?
